# gucci

A gluegun app designed to run `gucci create` generated projects.

## Usage

### gucci run all

Runs API, React Native Packager, and Web Application.

### gucci run ios

Runs API, React Native React Native, and starts IOS simulator.

### gucci run start

Runs API, React Native Packager, and Web Application.

### gucci run web

Runs API, and Web Application.

### gucci run API

Runs API.
